response.overview: Take it Easy, by MN explores the insufficient health systems refugees are forced to face, both in refugee detention and during their settlement in Australia. Held at arm’s length from the rest of the population and heavily managed by private companies, MN narrates her experiences with International Health & Medical Services (IHMS) in Australia’s offshore detention centre on Nauru, where the most consistent medical advice one gets on the edge of humanity is ‘take it easy’’.
response.title: Take it Easy
